content.text:
# Craven (Bradford ward)__disambig_1

Craven is an electoral ward within the City of Bradford Metropolitan District Council, West Yorkshire, England. The population of the ward at the 2011 Census was 16,373.
It encompasses the villages of Steeton with Eastburn in the south, Silsden in the centre and Addingham in the north.
Until.2023 it bordered the former  Craven District of North Yorkshire.
Councillors
The ward is represented on Bradford Council by 2 Green Party councillors, Caroline Whitaker  and Janet Russell, and one Conservative Party councillor, Peter Clarke.
